price: Say to those who do not believe, “Carry on in your ways; so will we do.
arabic: وَقُل لِّلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ ٱعۡمَلُواْ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمۡ إِنَّا عَٰمِلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
